bioconda.name: bioconductor-eximir
bioconda.summary: R functions for the normalization of Exiqon miRNA array data

biotools.summary: This package contains functions for reading raw data in ImaGene TXT format obtained from Exiqon miRCURY LNA arrays, annotating them with appropriate GAL files, and normalizing them using a spike-in probe-based method. Other platforms and data formats are also supported.

bioschemas.name: ExiMiR
bioschemas.summary: This package contains functions for reading raw data in ImaGene TXT format obtained from Exiqon miRCURY LNA arrays, annotating them with appropriate GAL files, and normalizing them using a spike-in probe-based method. Other platforms and data formats are also supported.
